attributes.action: Set up an international fund for birth control and sexual health
attributes.additional_details:
Join the Netherlands, and initiatives from Lilianne Ploumen, to help counteract the potentially devastating consequences of restrictions recently imposed by the US president - impacting the lives of millions around the world, based on an individual's beliefs.


Quote Siobhan Fenton for the Independent: 

"It prohibits US funding for any international aid groups which give women information about abortion, even if they do not perform the procedures."

full article: goo.gl/q0a1DH
attributes.background: The UK government must fund international projects which provide support for women in developing countries on birth control, abortion and education on sexual health.
